org.eclipse.keyple.core.seproxy.plugin.local

Interface MonitoringJob

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CardAbsentPingMonitoringJob, CardPresentMonitoringJob, SmartInsertionMonitoringJob, SmartRemovalMonitoringJob

    public interface MonitoringJob
    Monitoring jobs interface.

    Observable readers can instantiate MonitoringJob to perform background processing during the different states of the generic state machine.

    Internal events (AbstractObservableLocalReader.InternalEvent) can be fired to change the state of the machine via the AbstractObservableState class passed as a constructor's argument.

    Standard MonitoringJob are already defined in the local.monitoring package but it is possible to define new ones within a plugin reader if necessary, respecting this interface.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods
